mapper.select: select my.mygroup_no , my.mygroup_name , my.emp_no , count(fa.favorite_emp_no) as countEmp from tbl_mygroup my left join tbl_favorite fa on my.mygroup_no = fa.mygroup_no where emp_no = (select tbl_emp.emp_no from tbl_emp where username=#{username}) group by my.mygroup_no ;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_mygroup (emp_no, reg_user) values ((select emp_no from tbl_emp where username=#{username}) , (select emp_name from tbl_emp where username=#{username})) ;
